org.holoeverywhere

Class ThemeManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.holoeverywhere.ThemeManager

  • public final class ThemeManager
extends java.lang.Object
    ThemeManager for using different themes in activity, dialogs, etc.
    It uses the principle of binary flags. For example, you can get a dark theme on the fullscreen mixing the two flags:
    DARK | FULLSCREEN

    Default themes map for different flags:
    DARK LIGHT MIXED
    no other flags R.style.Holo_Theme R.style.Holo_Theme_Light R.style.Holo_Theme_Light_DarkActionBar
    FULLSCREEN R.style.Holo_Theme_Fullscreen R.style.Holo_Theme_Light_Fullscreen R.style.Holo_Theme_Light_DarkActionBar_Fullscreen
    NO_ACTION_BAR R.style.Holo_Theme_NoActionBar R.style.Holo_Theme_Light_NoActionBar R.style.Holo_Theme_Light_DarkActionBar_NoActionBar
    NO_ACTION_BAR | FULLSCREEN R.style.Holo_Theme_NoActionBar_Fullscreen R.style.Holo_Theme_Light_NoActionBar_Fullscreen R.style.Holo_Theme_Light_DarkActionBar_NoActionBar_Fullscreen
    WALLPAPER R.style.Holo_Theme_Wallpaper R.style.Holo_Theme_Light_Wallpaper R.style.Holo_Theme_Light_DarkActionBar_Wallpaper
    WALLPAPER | FULLSCREEN R.style.Holo_Theme_Fullscreen_Wallpaper R.style.Holo_Theme_Light_Fullscreen_Wallpaper R.style.Holo_Theme_Light_DarkActionBar_Fullscreen_Wallpaper
    WALLPAPER | NO_ACTION_BAR R.style.Holo_Theme_NoActionBar_Wallpaper R.style.Holo_Theme_Light_NoActionBar_Wallpaper R.style.Holo_Theme_Light_DarkActionBar_NoActionBar_Wallpaper
    WALLPAPER | NO_ACTION_BAR | FULLSCREEN R.style.Holo_Theme_NoActionBar_Fullscreen_Wallpaper R.style.Holo_Theme_Light_NoActionBar_Fullscreen_Wallpaper R.style.Holo_Theme_Light_DarkActionBar_NoActionBar_Fullscreen_Wallpaper
    DIALOG R.style.Holo_Theme_Dialog R.style.Holo_Theme_Dialog_Light R.style.Holo_Theme_Dialog_Light
    DIALOG_WHEN_LARGE R.style.Holo_Theme_DialogWhenLarge R.style.Holo_Theme_DialogWhenLarge_Light R.style.Holo_Theme_DialogWhenLarge_Light_DarkActionBar
    DIALOG_WHEN_LARGE | NO_ACTION_BAR R.style.Holo_Theme_DialogWhenLarge_NoActionBar R.style.Holo_Theme_DialogWhenLarge_Light_NoActionBar R.style.Holo_Theme_DialogWhenLarge_Light_DarkActionBar_NoActionBar

    You may remap themes for certain flags with method map(int, int) where first arg - flags, second - theme resource

    Part of HoloEverywhere

      • cloneTheme

        public static void cloneTheme(android.content.Intent sourceIntent,
              android.content.Intent intent,
              boolean force)
        Clone theme from sourceIntent to intent, if it specified for sourceIntent or set flag force
        Parameters:
        sourceIntent - Intent with specified _THEME_TAG
        intent - Intent into which will be put a theme
        force - Clone theme even if sourceIntent not contain _THEME_TAG

      • makeNewFlag

        public static int makeNewFlag()
        Generate flag for using it in ThemeManager. Not more than 24 flags can be created.

      • map

        public static void map(int theme)
        Remap default theme.
        See Also:
        map(int, int)

      • map

        public static void map(int flags,
       int theme)
        Remap themes.

        Example, you can remap LIGHT theme on R.style.Holo_Theme_Dialog_Light:

         ThemeManager.map(LIGHT, R.style.Holo_Theme_Dialog_Light);

        If theme value negative - remove pair flags-theme

      • modify

        public static void modify(int mod)
        Add modifier to all themes, using in ThemeManager. If you call modify(NO_ACTION_BAR), then all themes will be without action bar by default, regardless of the flag is passed.
        See Also:
        modifyClear(int), modifyClear(), setModifier(int)

      • modifyClear

        public static void modifyClear()
        Clear all modifiers
        See Also:
        modify(int), modifyClear(int), setModifier(int)

      • modifyClear

        public static void modifyClear(int mod)
        Clear modifier
        See Also:
        modify(int), modifyClear(), setModifier(int)

      • modifyDefaultTheme

        public static void modifyDefaultTheme(int mod)
        Like modify(int), but applying only on default theme.
        See Also:
        modifyDefaultThemeClear(int), setDefaultTheme(int), getDefaultTheme()

      • modifyDefaultThemeClear

        public static void modifyDefaultThemeClear(int mod)
        Clear modifier from default theme
        See Also:
        modifyDefaultTheme(int), setDefaultTheme(int), getDefaultTheme()

        public static void restartWithDarkTheme(Activity activity)
        Check activity on dark theme and restart it if theme incorrect.

        public static void restartWithMixedTheme(Activity activity)

        See Also:
        restartWithTheme(Activity, int)

      • restartWithTheme

        public static void restartWithTheme(Activity activity,
                    int theme)
        Check activity on theme and restart it if theme incorrect.
        Parameters:
        activity - Activity
        theme - Theme flags for check

      • restartWithTheme

        public static void restartWithTheme(Activity activity,
                    int theme,
                    boolean force)
        Like restartWithTheme(Activity, int), but if third arg is true - restart activity regardless theme.
        Parameters:
        activity - Activity
        theme - Theme flags for check
        force - Force restart activity
